role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Brave Browser on nearly any OS
role_description_full_overview: [Brave Browser](https://brave.com/) is a free and open-source web browser developed by Brave Software, Inc. based on the Chromium web browser. It includes the ability to access Tor websites and has a built-in plugin that replaces ads and pays you to surf the web.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Brave Browser on nearly any OS.
